trans-unit.source: Adds a block featuring product categories.
trans-unit.target: Adds a block featuring product categories.

trans-unit.source: Select which category is displayed in the block. The current category is the one the visitor is currently browsing.
trans-unit.target: Select which category is displayed in the block. The current category is the one the visitor is currently browsing.

trans-unit.source: Current category, unless it has no subcategories, in which case the parent category of the current category is used
trans-unit.target: Current category, unless it has no subcategories, in which case the parent category of the current category is used

trans-unit.source: Set the maximum depth of category sublevels displayed in this block (0 = infinite).
trans-unit.target: Set the maximum depth of category sublevels displayed in this block (0 = infinite).

trans-unit.source: Help navigation on your store, show your visitors current category and subcategories.
trans-unit.target: Help navigation on your store, show your visitors current category and subcategories.
